column3: How many years of experience do you have in treating/managing diabetic patients?
column4: How often do you provide dietary recommendations to elderly diabetic patients?
column5: Do elderly diabetic patients require different dietary guidelines compared to younger adults with diabetes?
column6: What are the most common diabetes-related complications you observe in elderly patients?
column7: What challenges do elderly diabetics face in maintaining proper nutrition?
column8: How important is portion control in meal planning for elderly diabetic patients?
column9: Have you ever used a digital tool or app to provide dietary recommendations for elderly diabetic patients?
column10: What is your primary method for diagnosing diabetes in elderly patients?
column11: In your professional opinion, what fasting blood sugar (FBS) level indicates different stages of diabetes?
column12: What postprandial blood sugar (after meals) level do you consider normal or concerning?
column13: What HbA1c percentage do you consider well-managed for elderly diabetics?
column14: How do you assess blood sugar control in elderly diabetic patients?
column15: What dietary or lifestyle factors do you consider when recommending meal plans for elderly diabetics?
column16: How well does the system align with existing dietary guidelines for elderly diabetics?
column17: Do you believe Sri Lankan traditional foods can be effectively integrated into structured diabetes-friendly meal plans?
column18: How scientifically valid do you consider the inclusion of traditional Sri Lankan foods in diabetes management?
column19: Which food categories should be excluded from the system due to their potential negative effects on diabetic patients?
column20: How frequently do your patients inquire about traditional foods for diabetes management?
column21: Would you recommend a personalized meal plan based on traditional Sri Lankan foods for diabetic patients?
column22: In your opinion, how suitable are traditional Sri Lankan foods for elderly people with diabetes?
column23: How important is it to include traditional Sri Lankan rice varieties in a diabetes-friendly meal plan? (e.g., Red Raw Rice, Heenati Rice, Suwandel Rice, Pachchaperumal Rice)
column24: How important is it to include traditional Sri Lankan grains & cereals in a diabetes meal plan? (e.g., Kurakkan (Finger Millet), Meneri (Foxtail Millet), Thana Hal (Sorghum), Maize (Corn))
column25: How important is it to include herbal porridges in diabetes meal plans for elderly individuals? (e.g., Gotu Kola Kenda, Polpala Kenda, Hathawariya Kenda)
column26: How important is it to include traditional Sri Lankan vegetables & leafy greens in a diabetes meal plan? (e.g., Gotu Kola Sambol, Murunga Kola Mallum, Kohila Mallum)
column27: How important is it to include traditional Sri Lankan curries & dishes in diabetes meal plans? (e.g., Kollu (Horse Gram Curry), Dhal Curry, Green Gram Curry, Jackfruit Seeds Curry)
column28: How important is it to include herbal drinks in a diabetes-friendly meal plan? (e.g., Beli Mal Tea, Ranawara Tea, Coriander Tea (Koththamalli))
column29: How important is it to include traditional Sri Lankan snacks in diabetes-friendly diets? (e.g., Roasted Gram (Kadala), Boiled Jackfruit Seeds (Kos Ata), Thala Guli (Sesame Balls))
column30: How accurately does the system consider individual health conditions when generating meal recommendations? (e.g., hypertension, kidney disease, cholesterol issues)?
column31: What additional health conditions should be integrated into meal plan adjustments?
column32: How important is it that the system allows personalized adjustments to meal plans?
column33: How easy is it for elderly diabetics to navigate and use the system?
column34: What factors could increase the adoption of this system among elderly diabetics?
column35: What are the main obstacles that might prevent elderly diabetics from using the system effectively?
column36: Based on your expertise, How would you rate the accuracy of the system’s recommended meals in meeting the nutritional and health needs of elderly diabetics?
column37: How likely are you to recommend this system to diabetic patients if improvements are made based on expert feedback?
column38: Would you be willing to collaborate in future research for refining this system?
column39: How suitable do you think a website would be for delivering meal recommendations to elderly diabetic users?
column40: Would you be willing to use this system as a reference tool when advising diabetic patients?
column41: What would make you more likely to trust in Machine Learning based food recommendation system?
